name: Only One Puzzle Game
description:
The Only One Puzzle Game is an abstract minimalistic puzzle game where each puzzle Only takes up One screen. In the game you use abilities to complete each puzzle, but every ability may Only be used Once!

There are 6 abilities, 7 different kind of objects and 25 puzzles in total. The 25 puzzles are categorized in 5 chapters:

  1. Moving the player!
  2. Boxes!
  3. Horizontal and vertical boxes!
  4. Restricted boxes!
  5. Everything!

Controls:

The controls are simple: use the left mouse button.

Hope you enjoy the game!
